posts.post_content: I love the conspicuously ethnic names they gave some of these guys. The Japanese-sounding ones like [Ayesha Tanaka](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ayesha Tanaka) at least make sense in the context of Kamigawa, but ones like this and [Ramirez DePietro](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ramirez DePietro) are just silly.
posts.html:
I love the conspicuously ethnic names they gave some of these guys. The Japanese-sounding ones like Ayesha Tanaka at least make sense in the context of Kamigawa, but ones like this and Ramirez DePietro are just silly.
